page.title: 06LIFESTYLE AT HEADLEY PARK
page.content: {LIFESTYLE My day starts at halfpast seven when I get up and brush my hair. At about 7.45 my Dad calls up the stairs for {breakfast.}I have Weetabix and toast for breakfast. Then I go and have a wash.School starts at 8.55 and first of all we do 12 practice sums. Then I go down to recorders in service. In assembly we have some songs and Mr. Searle tells us about the days happenings. Back in class we have to do decimals or fractions or an easier method of dividing sums. At 10.35 we have our break and until 10.50 for the rest of the morning we write different things. At dinnertime we play outside until the bell rings for dinner. I have hot dinners. At 3.45 we go home. At 6.00 Mum and Dad watch the news on T.V. while I go out to play. About 8.30 I go to bed. J.HOOPER.
